attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, my phone began to overheat. I turned it off and set it on my bed to cool down. Bad idea. I went downstairs to get a Bang energy drink, and returned to find my bed and curtains on fire. Thanks to the burst of energy from my Bang, I was able to grab a fire extinguisher and put out the flames. Now my Trump body pillow is gone forever. Disappointed and hurt that our president would let this happen.
attributes.title: almost burnt my house down

attributes.review: As a Trump supporter, I shouldn’t expect better. Good thing I can afford to buy a new phone after this app have destroyed my old one. Thank you Donald for not giving us a second stimulus check, you deserve to win the next election by  doing just that. Please keep working on this app so it can destroy more phones, and forces people to go purchase more phones with money that they don’t have, so our economy can grow and the wealthy people become wealthier. Just like you planned for this country. You’re so smart, just like me. God bless. I look forward to a more and improved app. Your all time supporter ~dumbface~
attributes.title: Worse app ever!

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded it took way to long to load and was slow in the app and had incorrect information if I could rate lower I would 2 thumbs down 👎🏽 👎🏽

attributes.title: disappointed even with low expectations

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to keep up with bunker boy who looks like an oompa lookups dipped in cheetos but it took like 69 minutes to download and it used all my WiFi😡.When It finally finished downloading I opened it and when I opened it I saw a bunch of pictures of that Oompa Loompa and I threw up on my pet potato named jimmy and it died 😭rip jimmy and right before he died he protested No! and he also yelled POTATO like how Niall horan yelled POTATO. Not only that my pet cat named Kevin also looked at the pictures and turned into a pigeon. I decided to take Kevin to the vet and the vet said that he has a rare disease called dumptrump-20 which turns animals into different animals when they look at pics of our Cheeto head president and it can kill them too. I don’t recommend this app at all it killed my pet potato jimmy who protested No! and it turned my pet cat Kevin in to a pigeon which also died because of dumptrump-20 and his past words were Zayn is a lovely guy 😭😭😭
attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP IS DISGUSTANG 🧚🏻✨

attributes.review: I entered my data, confirmed my registration, and the next thing I knew all my contacts had been deleted!  I’ve been trying to delete this app, but it keeps reinstalling. How do I get rid of this cancer???
attributes.title: Dangerous!!!!

attributes.review: At first it was great and then out of nowhere it just started glitching. I was very disappointed with how it downloaded too. 11/10 would not recommend
